alert.note: Alert for Cleveland (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 04 at 8:07PM CDT until October 04 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by earlier excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The Oklahoma City metro area, including the following counties, Cleveland and Oklahoma. * WHEN...Until 1030 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 805 PM CDT, While the heavy rain has ended, minor flooding may continue in poorly drained areas into the late evening hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Oklahoma City, Norman, Edmond, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Newcastle, Bethany, Choctaw, Warr Acres, The Village, Noble, Slaughterville, Spencer, Nichols Hills, Jones, Nicoma Park, Valley Brook, Arcadia and Tinker Air Force Base. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
